select
distinct
from merchant
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into merchant (id, user_id, title, group_id, city_id, bank_name, bank_no, bank_user, address, contact, phone, location, mobile, create_time, longitude, latitude, display, notice, start_time, end_time, delivery_time, business_license, operating_permit, print_code, card_money, card_activity, bidding_money, logo_url, promotion, cost_delivery, type, delivery_begin, deduction, order_num, income_date, dine_order_print, notice_time, is_delete, mobile_update_time, delivery_begin_update_time, alipay_limit, wechat_limit) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{cityId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{bankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bankUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{longitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{latitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{display,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{notice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{endTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{deliveryTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{businessLicense,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operatingPermit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{printCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardMoney,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{cardActivity,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{biddingMoney,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{logoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{promotion,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{costDelivery,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{type,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{deliveryBegin,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{deduction,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{incomeDate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dineOrderPrint,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{noticeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{mobileUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deliveryBeginUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{alipayLimit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{wechatLimit,jdbcType=INTEGER})

update merchant set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, group_id = #{groupId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, city_id = #{cityId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, bank_name = #{bankName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bank_no = #{bankNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, bank_user = #{bankUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contact = #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, location = #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, longitude = #{longitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, latitude = #{latitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, display = #{display,jdbcType=CHAR}, notice = #{notice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, delivery_time = #{deliveryTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, business_license = #{businessLicense,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, operating_permit = #{operatingPermit,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, print_code = #{printCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, card_money = #{cardMoney,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, card_activity = #{cardActivity,jdbcType=CHAR}, bidding_money = #{biddingMoney,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, logo_url = #{logoUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, promotion = #{promotion,jdbcType=CHAR}, cost_delivery = #{costDelivery,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, type = #{type,jdbcType=CHAR}, delivery_begin = #{deliveryBegin,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, deduction = #{deduction,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, order_num = #{orderNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, income_date = #{incomeDate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, dine_order_print = #{dineOrderPrint,jdbcType=CHAR}, notice_time = #{noticeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_delete = #{isDelete,jdbcType=TINYINT}, mobile_update_time = #{mobileUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, delivery_begin_update_time = #{deliveryBeginUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, alipay_limit = #{alipayLimit,jdbcType=INTEGER}, wechat_limit = #{wechatLimit,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT si.createTime create_time ,sum(si.total_money) total_money ,us.id user_id ,us.mobile user_mobile ,ca.name user_name ,ca.id_card id_card FROM merchant m JOIN supply_chain_order_info si on m.id = si.dest_Id JOIN user us ON us.id=m.user_id JOIN `0085_cashier` ca on ca.merchant_id=m.id WHERE dest_Id=#{merchant_id} AND si.createTime BETWEEN #{create_time} and #{now_time}

SELECT si.createTime create_time ,count(1) stock_count ,us.id user_id ,us.mobile user_mobile ,ca.name user_name ,ca.id_card id_card FROM merchant m JOIN supply_chain_order_info si on m.id = si.dest_Id JOIN user us ON us.id=m.user_id JOIN `0085_cashier` ca on ca.merchant_id=m.id WHERE dest_Id=#{merchant_id} AND si.createTime BETWEEN #{create_time} and #{now_time}
